commands.speaker: Little Sister
commands.line: Hey, will you show us something too!

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: M-Me?

commands.speaker: Little Sister
commands.line: Yeah!

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: Okay then. Riko, can I borrow that stick... I mean, magic wand?

commands.speaker: Riko
commands.line: Of course, here you go.

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: Ahem! Now then, with your permission, I would like to demonstrate my magic power!

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: When I give the signal, please count down from three as loudly as you can.

commands.speaker: Little Sister
commands.line: Okay! Got it!

commands.speaker: Nozomi
commands.line: What is Shizuku planning to do?

commands.speaker: Dia
commands.line: Hmm, I haven't the slightest idea.

commands.speaker: Kotori
commands.line: I think it'll be okay, though. She seems really confident!

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: Here I go. Ready?

commands.speaker: Together
commands.line: Three!

commands.speaker: Together
commands.line: Two!

commands.speaker: Together
commands.line: One!

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: Water spirits, lend me your cleansing powers! Surge forth and cleanse the earth!

commands.speaker: Little Sister
commands.line: Wooow!

commands.speaker: Riko
commands.line: Amazing! Jets of water are shooting out of the fountain!

commands.speaker: Kotori
commands.line: It's so pretty!

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: Behold, my water fountain magic!

commands.speaker: Dia
commands.line: That was truly incredible! How did she do that?!

commands.speaker: Nozomi
commands.line: I think that water fountain is set to shoot water out like that at specific times.

commands.speaker: Kotori
commands.line: Ah, so she just matched her timing to it.

commands.speaker: Dia
commands.line: I see.

commands.speaker: Riko
commands.line: That was really clever. She's very observant.

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: Well? Did you like my magic?

commands.speaker: Little Sister
commands.line: Yeah! It was so cool!

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: Thank you! I'm so happy to hear you say that.

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: Shizuko is a genius! I can't believe she came up with something so perfect like that on the spot!

commands.speaker: Nozomi
commands.line: ...Kasumin mumbled to herself, while hiding in the shade of a tree.

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: Gah! N-Nozomi! Where did you come from?!

commands.speaker: Nozomi
commands.line: You can really tell that Shizuku is used to being on stage. She's not afraid to take chances.

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: Th-That's so true. But she couldn't have done it if I hadn't set it all up for her!

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: Riko and Shizuko displayed some amazing feats of magic! Just like I knew they would!

commands.speaker: Nozomi
commands.line: ...Kasumin loudly boasted, as she put on a brave front.

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: Come on, Nozomi! That's not what I'm doing!

commands.speaker: Nozomi
commands.line: *Giggle* It's so cute when you get all defensive like that.

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: Seriously! Please stop teasing me!

commands.speaker: Nozomi
commands.line: I'm not. I seriously think you're cute.
